flawed_nl_solution:
Lauren sent 65 + 10 = <<65+10=57>>57 pieces of mail on Tuesday.
He sent 57 - 5 = <<57-5=52>>52 pieces of mail on Wednesday.
And sent 52 + 15 = <<52+15=67>>67 pieces of mail on Thursday.
Therefore, he sent 65 + 57 + 52 + 67 = <<65+57+52+67=241>>241 pieces of mail.
#### 241

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 57. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
